'''Jennifer Coolidge''' is an American actress, known for her roles in the ''{{Wikipedia|American Pie (film series)|American Pie}}'' and ''{{Wikipedia|Legally Blonde (franchise)|Legally Blonde}}'' film franchises.

== In the ''Minecraft'' franchise ==
{{Main|Movie:Vice Principal Marlene}}
Coolidge was announced to be appearing in {{AMCM}} on January 17, 2024.<ref name="FilmBegan2">{{Citation|url=https://deadline.com/2024/01/minecraft-jennifer-coolidge-1235795092/|title=Warner Bros’ Jason Momoa 'Minecraft' Movie Finds Gem In Jennifer Coolidge – ;|author=Anthony D'Alessandro|website=Deadline Hollywood|date=January 17, 2024}}</ref> Within the film, she plays a high school vice principal, still dealing with the fallout of a divorce. On a fateful day, she encounters a {{AMCM|nitwit}} and falls in love, engaged to him by the end of the film.

== Trivia ==

* Director [[Jared Hess]] claimed to have envisioned Coolidge for the part as he pitched the film.{{Citation needed}}
